metadata.description: This prefix will be applied at the beginning of all resources possible. An empty string is a valid input if this is not desireable to use. This only supports using hyphens ('-') and underscores ('_') as seprators/delimiters.
The base name of the resources to create. This only supports using hyphens ('-') and underscores ('_') as seprators/delimiters.
Version of PowerSTIG to use. Previous default was 4.7.1

output.value:
[replace(replace(if(equals(parameters('globalPrefix'), ''),
                                                    concat(parameters('typePrefix'), parameters('delimiter'), parameters('name')),
                                                    concat(parameters('globalPrefix'), parameters('delimiter'), parameters('typePrefix'), parameters('delimiter'), parameters('name'))),
                                                '-',
                                                if(equals(parameters('removeAllDelimiters'), true()), '', parameters('delimiter'))),
                                            '_',
                                            if(equals(parameters('removeAllDelimiters'), true()), '', parameters('delimiter')))]

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Azure DISA STIG Workbook
---

Welcome to the Azure DISA STIG Compliance workbook.  This workbook provides visualized compliance data generated by the Azure Image Builder STIG solution.


"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"STIG_Compliance_CL
| distinct FindingID_s, DesiredState_b
| summarize count() by tostring(DesiredState_b)","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Overall STIG Status","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"False","label":"Not Applied","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"True","label":"Applied","color":"green"},{"seriesName":"","label":"Manual"}]}},"customWidth":"40","showPin":true,"name":"Computers"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"STIG_Compliance_CL
| where DesiredState_b == false
| distinct FindingID_s, Computer
| summarize count(FindingID_s) by Computer
","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Open STIGs by Computer","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"30","showPin":true,"name":"Open STIGs by Computer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"STIG_Compliance_CL
| where DesiredState_b == false
| distinct FindingID_s, Severity_s, DesiredState_b
| summarize count(FindingID_s) by Severity_s 
","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Open STIGs by Severity","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"STIG_Compliance_CL","label":"STIG Compliance"},{"seriesName":"","label":"informational"}]}},"customWidth":"30","showPin":true,"name":"Open STIGs by severity"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"STIG_Compliance_Computer_CL  | distinct Computer, DesiredState_b, Domain_s","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Overall Compliance State by Computer","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"33","showPin":true,"name":"query - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"STIG_Compliance_CL 
| distinct Computer, FindingID_s, Severity_s, DesiredState_b 
| extend Success = case(DesiredState_b == true, "Applied",
                        DesiredState_b == false, "Not-Applied",
                        "Question")","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"STIG Status and Details by Computer","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000,"filter":true,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["Computer","Success","Severity_s"]}}},"customWidth":"66","showPin":true,"name":"STIG Status and Details by Computer"}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["/subscriptions/bf031e99-23ef-4cc3-b5a9-b2761eb6126d/resourceGroups/STIG_DEMO/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/STIGDEMO-WS-usgovvirginia"],"styleSettings":{"paddingStyle":"narrow","spacingStyle":"narrow"}}
